content: the stella fingerless gloves are the third pattern in the stella collection which includes a hat and scarf this pattern features star stitch and half_double_crochet i used super soft herriot yarn by juniper moon farm a 100% baby alpaca yarn with a slight halo you can use any dk weight yarn you d like and a size h crochet hook these gloves are sized for women s small 7 medium 7 5 and large 8 with measurement taken around the four finger knuckles the gloves measure approximately 7 75 long though instructions are included to extend the length of the finger section if desired the small size is also available for free on my blog at https //kickincrochet com/stella-fingerless-gloves 1 the pdf is available to purchase or you can get the complete set of three accessories at a 20% discount compared to the individual pattern prices 1 https //kickincrochet com/stella-fingerless-gloves
